byline.original: By SANGAR RAHIMI and RAY RIVERA
byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi reported from Dasht-e-Rabat, and Ray Rivera from Kabul, Afghanistan.

abstract: Fuel tanker with a bomb hidden on board explodes near Kabul, Afghanistan, killing at least 10 people and leaving dozens more badly burned; attack occurs in a province that was to be listed as one of the 17 areas under consideration for the second stage of security transition from NATO to Afghan control.
snippet: A fuel tanker with a bomb hidden on board exploded on the road to Bagram Air Base Tuesday night, setting off an inferno that killed at least 10 people and left dozens more badly burned.
lead_paragraph: A fuel tanker with a bomb hidden on board exploded on the road to Bagram Air Base Tuesday night, setting off an inferno that killed at least 10 people and left dozens more badly burned.

headline.main: Bomb Leads to Fatal Fire on Tanker Near Kabul
headline.print_headline: Bomb Leads To Fatal Fire On Tanker Near Kabul
headline.seo: Bomb Blast on Fuel Tanker Near Afghan Air Base Kills 10
